quiz.question: _____ pillar
quiz.explanation: 柱子; 支柱, 石柱. The ancient temple was supported by a massive stone pillar. 古老的寺庙由一根巨大的石柱支撑。

quiz.question: caterpillar _____
quiz.explanation: 毛毛虫; 履带, 履带. The tank moved slowly on its caterpillar track across rough terrain. 坦克在崎岖的地形上用履带缓慢移动。

quiz.question: _____ collar
quiz.explanation: 衣领; 项圈, 白领. She worked in a white collar office environment. 她在白领办公环境中工作。

quiz.question: molar _____
quiz.explanation: 臼齿, 臼齿. The dentist examined my molar tooth for cavities. 牙医检查我的臼齿是否有蛀牙。

quiz.question: polar ________
quiz.explanation: 极地的; 截然相反的, 截然相反. Their political views were polar opposite on every issue. 他们的政治观点在每个问题上都截然相反。

quiz.question: ______ vernacular
quiz.explanation: 方言; 本地话, 街头俚语. The rapper used street vernacular in his lyrics. 说唱歌手在歌词中使用街头俚语。

quiz.question: oracular _____________
quiz.explanation: 神谕的; 晦涩的, 神谕般的声明. The philosopher made an oracular pronouncement about the future. 哲学家对未来作出了神谕般的声明。

quiz.question: spectacular ____
quiz.explanation: 壮观的; 惊人的, 壮观的景色. The mountain summit offered a spectacular view of the valley. 山顶提供了山谷的壮观景色。

quiz.question: secular _________
quiz.explanation: 世俗的; 非宗教的, 世俗教育. The country adopted a secular education system. 该国采用了世俗教育体系。

quiz.question: perpendicular ____
quiz.explanation: 垂直的, 垂直线. Draw a perpendicular line from the base to the apex. 从底边到顶点画一条垂直线。

quiz.question: auricular _____
quiz.explanation: 耳的; 听觉的, 耳神经. The doctor examined the damage to the auricular nerve. 医生检查了耳神经的损伤。

quiz.question: particular _______
quiz.explanation: 特别的; 特定的, 特别关注. Safety is a particular concern for parents. 安全是父母特别关注的问题。

quiz.question: avuncular ______
quiz.explanation: 伯父般的; 慈祥的, 伯父般的建议. He offered avuncular advice to the young graduates. 他向年轻的毕业生提供了伯父般的建议。

quiz.question: ocular _______
quiz.explanation: 眼睛的; 视觉的, 眼疾. The patient suffered from a serious ocular disease. 患者患有严重的眼疾。

quiz.question: jocular ____
quiz.explanation: 滑稽的; 诙谐的, 诙谐的语气. He spoke in a jocular tone to lighten the mood. 他用诙谐的语气说话来缓和气氛。

quiz.question: circular ______
quiz.explanation: 圆形的; 循环的, 圆周运动. The planets follow a circular motion around the sun. 行星围绕太阳做圆周运动。

quiz.question: vascular ______
quiz.explanation: 血管的, 血管系统. The vascular system carries blood throughout the body. 血管系统将血液输送到全身。

quiz.question: crepuscular _____
quiz.explanation: 黄昏的; 朦胧的, 黄昏之光. The photographer captured the crepuscular light at dusk. 摄影师捕捉到了黄昏时的黄昏之光。

quiz.question: angular ____
quiz.explanation: 有角的; 棱角分明的, 棱角分明的脸. The model had an angular face with sharp cheekbones. 模特有一张棱角分明的脸,颧骨很高。

quiz.question: insular _________
quiz.explanation: 岛屿的; 狭隘的, 狭隘心态. The community suffered from an insular mentality. 该社区存在狭隘心态。

quiz.question: titular ____
quiz.explanation: 名义上的; 有名无实的, 名义上的领导. He was the titular head of the organization with no real authority. 他是该组织名义上的领导,没有实权。

quiz.question: mar ___ _______
quiz.explanation: 损坏; 破坏, 损坏表面. Be careful not to mar the surface of the antique table. 小心不要损坏古董桌的表面。

quiz.question: ______ oar
quiz.explanation: 桨; 橹, 木桨. The rowers pulled the wooden oar through the water. 划船者用木桨在水中划动。

quiz.question: _____ nectar
quiz.explanation: 花蜜; 甘露, 饮用花蜜. Bees collect and drink nectar from flowers. 蜜蜂从花朵中采集和饮用花蜜。

quiz.question: ___ mortar
quiz.explanation: 灰浆; 研钵, 搅拌灰浆. The mason had to mix mortar for the brickwork. 泥瓦匠必须为砖砌工程搅拌灰浆。

quiz.question: jabber ____
quiz.explanation: 快速含糊地说, 喋喋不休. The children would jabber away in the playground. 孩子们会在操场上喋喋不休。

quiz.question: limber ____
quiz.explanation: 柔软的; 灵活的, 柔软的身体. Yoga helps maintain a limber body as you age. 瑜伽有助于随着年龄增长保持柔软的身体。

quiz.question: ______ timber
quiz.explanation: 木材; 木料, 木材. The construction crew ordered lumber timber for the new house. 施工队为新房订购了木材。

quiz.question: cumber ____ _____
quiz.explanation: 妨碍; 使负担, 用规则束缚. Too many regulations cumber with rules the creative process. 太多的规定用规则束缚了创作过程。

quiz.question: encumber ________
quiz.explanation: 妨碍; 阻碍, 阻碍进展. Excessive bureaucracy can encumber progress in any organization. 过度的官僚主义会阻碍任何组织的进展。

quiz.question: lumber ____
quiz.explanation: 木材; 缓慢移动, 木材场. We bought supplies from the local lumber yard. 我们从当地木材场购买了物资。

quiz.question: ____ slumber
quiz.explanation: 睡眠; 沉睡, 深度睡眠. The baby fell into a deep slumber after feeding. 婴儿喂食后进入深度睡眠。

quiz.question: sober ________
quiz.explanation: 清醒的; 冷静的, 冷静的判断. The situation required sober judgment rather than emotion. 这种情况需要冷静的判断而不是情绪化。

quiz.question: ______ tuber
quiz.explanation: 块茎, 马铃薯块茎. The farmer harvested the potato tuber from the field. 农民从田里收获马铃薯块茎。

quiz.question: _______ ulcer
quiz.explanation: 溃疡, 胃溃疡. Stress can contribute to developing a stomach ulcer. 压力会导致胃溃疡的形成。

quiz.question: freelancer ___
quiz.explanation: 自由职业者, 自由职业者工作. She found a new freelancer gig designing websites. 她找到了一份设计网站的新自由职业者工作。

quiz.question: ______ fodder
quiz.explanation: 饲料; 素材, 炮灰. The young soldiers were treated as cannon fodder in the war. 年轻士兵在战争中被当作炮灰。

quiz.question: ____ rudder
quiz.explanation: 舵, 船舵. The captain turned the ship rudder to change course. 船长转动船舵改变航向。

quiz.question: bewilder ___ ________
quiz.explanation: 使困惑; 使迷惑, 使观众困惑. The magician's tricks would bewilder the audience completely. 魔术师的戏法会完全使观众困惑。

quiz.question: ____ folder
quiz.explanation: 文件夹, 文件夹. Please save the document in the file folder on the desktop. 请将文档保存在桌面上的文件夹中。

quiz.question: ___ beholder
quiz.explanation: 旁观者; 观看者, 旁观者. Beauty is in the eye of the beholder. 情人眼里出西施。

quiz.question: solder _____
quiz.explanation: 焊接; 焊料, 焊接接头. The technician carefully heated the solder joint. 技术员小心地加热焊接接头。

quiz.question: ____ boulder
quiz.explanation: 巨石, 巨大的巨石. A huge boulder blocked the mountain path. 一块巨大的巨石挡住了山路。

quiz.question: shoulder ___ ______
quiz.explanation: 肩膀; 承担, 承担负担. He had to shoulder the burden of caring for his family alone. 他不得不独自承担照顾家人的负担。

quiz.question: meander _____
quiz.explanation: 蜿蜒而行; 漫步, 蜿蜒的河流. The meander river wound slowly through the valley. 蜿蜒的河流缓慢地穿过山谷。

quiz.question: _ gander __
quiz.explanation: 雄鹅; 看一眼, 看一眼. Take a gander at this interesting article. 看一眼这篇有趣的文章。

quiz.question: _______ colander
quiz.explanation: 滤器; 漏勺, 厨房滤器. Drain the pasta using a kitchen colander. 用厨房滤器沥干意大利面。

quiz.question: gerrymander ________
quiz.explanation: 不公正地划分选区, 不公正划分的选区. Politicians tried to gerrymander district boundaries for electoral advantage. 政客们试图为了选举优势而不公正划分选区边界。

quiz.question: pander __ ______
quiz.explanation: 迎合; 拉皮条, 迎合口味. The media tends to pander to tastes of the lowest common denominator. 媒体往往迎合最低共同标准的口味。

quiz.question: squander _____
quiz.explanation: 挥霍; 浪费, 挥霍金钱. Don't squander money on things you don't need. 不要在你不需要的东西上挥霍金钱。

quiz.question: ___ fender
quiz.explanation: 挡泥板, 汽车挡泥板. The accident left a dent in the car fender. 事故在汽车挡泥板上留下了凹痕。

quiz.question: engender _____
quiz.explanation: 产生; 引起, 产生信任. Good communication can engender trust between team members. 良好的沟通可以在团队成员之间产生信任。

quiz.question: render _ _______
quiz.explanation: 提供; 宣布, 宣布裁决. The jury will render a verdict after deliberation. 陪审团将在审议后宣布裁决。

quiz.question: ________ surrender
quiz.explanation: 投降; 放弃, 军事投降. The enemy announced their military surrender at dawn. 敌人在黎明时宣布军事投降。

quiz.question: tender _____
quiz.explanation: 温柔的; 投标, 投标报价. The company submitted a tender offer to buy the competitor. 该公司提交了收购竞争对手的投标报价。

quiz.question: _____ provender
quiz.explanation: 饲料; 食物, 马饲料. The stable keeper prepared horse provender for the evening. 马厩管理员为晚上准备了马饲料。

quiz.question: ___ remainder
quiz.explanation: 剩余部分, 剩余部分. She spent the remainder of the day reading. 她把一天剩余的时间都用来阅读。

quiz.question: _______ faultfinder
quiz.explanation: 挑剔的人; 吹毛求疵者, 长期挑剔的人. The chronic faultfinder complained about every minor detail. 这个长期挑剔的人对每个小细节都抱怨。

quiz.question: hinder ________
quiz.explanation: 阻碍; 妨碍, 阻碍进展. Bad weather conditions can hinder progress on construction projects. 恶劣的天气条件会阻碍建筑项目的进展。

quiz.question: ______ cylinder
quiz.explanation: 圆柱体; 汽缸, 发动机气缸. The mechanic checked each engine cylinder for damage. 机械师检查每个发动机气缸是否有损坏。

quiz.question: ________ reminder
quiz.explanation: 提醒物; 提示, 友好的提醒. This is just a friendly reminder about tomorrow's meeting. 这只是关于明天会议的友好提醒。

quiz.question: _____ rejoinder
quiz.explanation: 回答; 反驳, 机智的回答. She delivered a witty rejoinder that silenced her critics. 她做出了一个机智的回答,让批评者哑口无言。

quiz.question: tinder ___
quiz.explanation: 火绒; 引火物, 火绒盒. The old tinder box contained materials to start a fire. 旧火绒盒里装着生火的材料。

quiz.question: ____ larder
quiz.explanation: 食品储藏室, 食品储藏室. She stocked the food larder with provisions for winter. 她在食品储藏室里储存了冬天的食物。

quiz.question: _____ girder
quiz.explanation: 大梁; 主梁, 钢梁. The bridge was supported by massive steel girder beams. 这座桥由巨大的钢梁支撑。

quiz.question: sheer _____
quiz.explanation: 陡峭的; 纯粹的, 陡峭的悬崖. The climbers faced a sheer cliff that rose hundreds of feet. 登山者面对一座高达数百英尺的陡峭悬崖。

quiz.question: _____ veneer
quiz.explanation: 饰面; 虚饰, 道德伪装. His politeness was just a moral veneer hiding his true intentions. 他的礼貌只是掩盖其真实意图的道德伪装。

quiz.question: _____ mutineer
quiz.explanation: 叛变者, 海军叛变者. The naval mutineer was court-martialed for his actions. 这名海军叛变者因其行为被军事法庭审判。

quiz.question: racketeer ____
quiz.explanation: 敲诈者; 诈骗者, 敲诈团伙. The police broke up a dangerous racketeer ring. 警方捣毁了一个危险的敲诈团伙。

quiz.question: ___ profiteer
quiz.explanation: 奸商; 牟取暴利者, 战争奸商. The war profiteer made millions from selling supplies. 战争奸商通过出售物资赚取了数百万。

quiz.question: steer ___ ____________
quiz.explanation: 驾驶; 引导, 引导对话. She tried to steer the conversation away from controversial topics. 她试图引导对话远离有争议的话题。

quiz.question: _____ gazetteer
quiz.explanation: 地名词典, 世界地名词典. The world gazetteer listed every major city and landmark. 世界地名词典列出了每个主要城市和地标。

quiz.question: queer ____
quiz.explanation: 奇怪的; 古怪的, 奇怪的想法. That's a queer idea that nobody has considered before. 那是一个以前没人考虑过的奇怪想法。

quiz.question: defer _______
quiz.explanation: 推迟; 延期, 延期付款. The bank allowed us to defer payment for three months. 银行允许我们延期付款三个月。

quiz.question: ____ coffer
quiz.explanation: 保险箱; 金库, 铁保险箱. The valuable documents were locked in an iron coffer. 贵重文件被锁在铁保险箱里。

quiz.question: buffer ____
quiz.explanation: 缓冲; 缓冲区, 缓冲区. The UN established a buffer zone between the warring factions. 联合国在交战派系之间建立了一个缓冲区。

quiz.question: _________ conifer
quiz.explanation: 针叶树, 常绿针叶树. The forest was filled with tall evergreen conifer trees. 森林里到处都是高大的常绿针叶树。

quiz.question: ________ aquifer
quiz.explanation: 含水层, 承压含水层. The city drew water from a deep confined aquifer. 该市从深层承压含水层取水。

quiz.question: infer _______
quiz.explanation: 推断; 推论, 推断意义. We can infer meaning from the context of the sentence. 我们可以从句子的上下文推断意义。

quiz.question: meager ______
quiz.explanation: 贫乏的; 微薄的, 微薄的收入. They struggled to survive on their meager income. 他们努力靠微薄的收入生存。

quiz.question: ______ forager
quiz.explanation: 觅食者, 森林觅食者. The forest forager collected mushrooms and berries. 森林觅食者采集蘑菇和浆果。

quiz.question: badger ____ _________
quiz.explanation: 獾; 纠缠, 用问题纠缠. The reporters would badger with questions every witness at the scene. 记者们会用问题纠缠现场的每个目击者。

quiz.question: _______ ledger
quiz.explanation: 分类账; 账簿, 总账. The accountant recorded all transactions in the general ledger. 会计在总账中记录了所有交易。

quiz.question: ____ ranger
quiz.explanation: 护林员; 巡逻员, 公园护林员. The park ranger guided tourists through the wilderness. 公园护林员带领游客穿越荒野。

quiz.question: harbinger __ ______
quiz.explanation: 先兆; 预兆, 变革的先兆. The election results were seen as a harbinger of change. 选举结果被视为变革的先兆。

quiz.question: ginger ___
quiz.explanation: 姜; 生姜, 姜茶. She drank ginger tea to soothe her upset stomach. 她喝姜茶来缓解胃部不适。

quiz.question: malinger __ ____
quiz.explanation: 装病; 逃避工作, 在工作中装病. Some employees malinger at work to avoid difficult tasks. 一些员工在工作中装病以逃避困难任务。

quiz.question: ____ versemonger
quiz.explanation: 蹩脚诗人, 蹩脚诗人. The critic dismissed him as a hack versemonger with no talent. 批评家认为他是一个没有才华的蹩脚诗人。

quiz.question: _______ forger
quiz.explanation: 伪造者, 技艺高超的伪造者. The skilled forger created convincing fake documents. 技艺高超的伪造者制作了令人信服的假文件。

quiz.question: ___ __ auger
quiz.explanation: 螺旋钻, 使用螺旋钻. The carpenter will use an auger to drill holes in the wood. 木匠将使用螺旋钻在木头上钻孔。

quiz.question: archer ____
quiz.explanation: 弓箭手, 射水鱼. The archer fish shoots water at insects above the surface. 射水鱼向水面上的昆虫射水。

quiz.question: pitcher _____
quiz.explanation: 水罐; 投手, 猪笼草. The carnivorous pitcher plant traps insects for nutrition. 食肉的猪笼草捕捉昆虫作为营养。

quiz.question: lexicographer ___
quiz.explanation: 词典编纂者, 词典编纂者的工作. The lexicographer job requires extensive knowledge of language. 词典编纂者的工作需要广泛的语言知识。

quiz.question: cartographer's ___
quiz.explanation: 地图制作者, 地图制作者的地图. The cartographer's map showed incredible detail of the terrain. 地图制作者的地图显示了地形的惊人细节。

quiz.question: ______ cipher
quiz.explanation: 密码; 暗号, 秘密密码. Spies communicated using a secret cipher during the war. 间谍在战争期间使用秘密密码进行通信。

quiz.question: decipher _ ____
quiz.explanation: 破译; 解码, 破译密码. The cryptographer worked to decipher a code from the enemy. 密码学家努力破译敌人的密码。

quiz.question: encipher _ _______
quiz.explanation: 加密, 加密信息. Intelligence officers must encipher a message before transmission. 情报官员必须在传输前加密信息。

quiz.question: ___ gusher
quiz.explanation: 喷涌的东西, 油井喷涌. The prospectors struck an oil gusher in the Texas plains. 勘探者在德克萨斯平原上发现了一个喷油井。

quiz.question: ______ bather
quiz.explanation: 沐浴者, 公共泳者. The public bather enjoyed swimming at the community pool. 公共泳者喜欢在社区游泳池游泳。

quiz.question: bellwether _____
quiz.explanation: 领头羊; 指标, 指标股. Analysts watch the bellwether stock to predict market trends. 分析师关注指标股以预测市场趋势。
